scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/ishkul-backend && gcloud run deploy ishkul-backend --image gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/ishkul-backend --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && go mod download
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o bin/server cmd/server/main.go
